page.title: 15Chorleywood Scout Group
page.content: The 1st Chorleywood is the local Scout Group of nearly 300 members. It has four Cub Packs for 8-11 year olds and four Scout Troops for 11-15 year olds. The Headquarters is one of the largest in Britain with a large garage, two hall, kitchen and toilets. The group owns several canoes and a large van. There is also a mixed Venture Scout Unit which does a lot more adventurous activities. There is a Cub football league which involves teams from each Cub Pack and others in the District. The Distict also owns a campsite in the grounds of Chorleywood House. At the campsite we do many evening activities like cooking sausages as well as camping for all ages. There is a small hall at the campsite which is used by Packs and Troops camping there.
